NODE.name: setUnresolvedEntityPath
NODE.DESCRIPTION: set the path of unresolved entities

NODE.name: setNsPrefixBlacklist
NODE.DESCRIPTION: set blacklist of funder nsPrefixes

NODE.DESCRIPTION: Set the path containing the PROD AGGREGATOR graph

NODE.DESCRIPTION: Set the target path to store the RAW graph

NODE.name: setCleanedFirstGraphPath
NODE.DESCRIPTION: Set the target path to store the the consistent graph cleaned

NODE.name: setResolvedGraphPath
NODE.DESCRIPTION: Set the target path to store the CLEANED graph

NODE.name: setDedupGraphPath
NODE.DESCRIPTION: Set the target path to store the DEDUPED graph

NODE.name: setInferredGraphPath
NODE.DESCRIPTION: Set the target path to store the INFERRED graph

NODE.name: setConsistentGraphPath
NODE.DESCRIPTION: Set the target path to store the CONSISTENCY graph

NODE.name: setOrcidGraphPath
NODE.DESCRIPTION: Set the target path to store the ORCID enriched graph

NODE.name: setBulkTaggingGraphPath
NODE.DESCRIPTION: Set the target path to store the BULK TAGGED graph

NODE.name: setAffiliationGraphPath
NODE.DESCRIPTION: Set the target path to store the AFFILIATION from INSTITUTIONAL REPOS graph

NODE.name: setCommunityOrganizationGraphPath
NODE.DESCRIPTION: Set the target path to store the COMMUNITY from SELECTED SOURCES graph

NODE.name: setFundingGraphPath
NODE.DESCRIPTION: Set the target path to store the FUNDING from SEMANTIC RELATION graph

NODE.name: setCommunitySemRelGraphPath
NODE.DESCRIPTION: Set the target path to store the COMMUNITY from SEMANTIC RELATION graph

NODE.name: setCountryGraphPath
NODE.DESCRIPTION: Set the target path to store the COUNTRY enriched graph

NODE.name: setCleanedGraphPath
NODE.DESCRIPTION: Set the target path to store the CLEANED graph

NODE.name: setBlacklistedGraphPath
NODE.DESCRIPTION: Set the target path to store the blacklisted graph

NODE.name: setBulkTaggingPathMap
NODE.DESCRIPTION: Set the map of paths for the Bulk Tagging

NODE.name: setPropagationOrganizationCommunityMap
NODE.DESCRIPTION: Set the map of associations organization, community list for the propagation of community to result through organization

NODE.name: setDedupConfig
NODE.DESCRIPTION: Set the dedup orchestrator name

NODE.name: actionSetsRaw
NODE.DESCRIPTION: declares the ActionSet ids to promote in the RAW graph

NODE.name: actionSetsIIS
NODE.DESCRIPTION: declares the ActionSet ids to promote in the INFERRED graph

NODE.name: setIsLookUpUrl
NODE.DESCRIPTION: Set the IS lookup service address

NODE.name: waitConfig
NODE.DESCRIPTION: wait configurations

NODE.name: reuseODFClaims
NODE.DESCRIPTION: reuse cached ODF claims from the PROD aggregation system

NODE.name: reuseODF_hdfs
NODE.DESCRIPTION: reuse cached ODF records on HDFS from the PROD aggregation system

NODE.name: reuseOAFClaims
NODE.DESCRIPTION: reuse cached OAF claims from the PROD aggregation system

NODE.name: reuseOAF_hdfs
NODE.DESCRIPTION: reuse cached OAF records on HDFS from the PROD aggregation system

NODE.name: reuseDB
NODE.DESCRIPTION: reuse cached DB content from the PROD aggregation system

NODE.name: reuseDBOpenorgs
NODE.DESCRIPTION: reuse cached OpenOrgs content from the PROD aggregation system

NODE.name: reuseODF
NODE.DESCRIPTION: reuse cached ODF content from the PROD aggregation system

NODE.name: reuseOAF
NODE.DESCRIPTION: reuse cached OAF content from the PROD aggregation system

NODE.name: contentPath
NODE.DESCRIPTION: set the PROD aggregator content path

NODE.name: waitConfig2
NODE.DESCRIPTION: wait configurations

NODE.name: aggregatorGraph
NODE.DESCRIPTION: create the PROD AGGREGATOR graph

NODE.name: promoteActionsRaw
NODE.DESCRIPTION: create the RAW graph

NODE.name: graphCleaningFirst
NODE.DESCRIPTION: clean the properties in the graph typed as Qualifier according to the vocabulary indicated in schemeid

NODE.name: patchHostedBy
NODE.DESCRIPTION: updates publication's hostedby info according to the ISSNs available from DOAJ and UNIBI

NODE.name: graphResolution
NODE.DESCRIPTION: Graph resolution

NODE.name: duplicateScan
NODE.DESCRIPTION: search for duplicates in the raw graph

NODE.name: promoteActionsIIS
NODE.DESCRIPTION: create the INFERRED graph

NODE.name: dedupConsistency
NODE.DESCRIPTION: mark duplicates as deleted and redistribute the relationships

NODE.name: orcidPropagation
NODE.DESCRIPTION: propagates ORCID among results linked by allowedsemrels semantic relationships

NODE.name: bulkTagging
NODE.DESCRIPTION: mark results respecting some rules as belonging to communities

NODE.name: affiliationPropagation
NODE.DESCRIPTION: creates relashionships between results and organizations when the organizations are associated to institutional repositories

NODE.name: communityOrganizationPropagation
NODE.DESCRIPTION: marks as belonging to communities the result collected from datasources related to the organizations specified in the organizationCommunityMap

NODE.name: resultProjectPropagation
NODE.DESCRIPTION: created relation between projects and results linked to other results trough allowedsemrel semantic relations linked to projects

NODE.name: communitySemrelPropagation
NODE.DESCRIPTION: tag as belonging to communitites result in in allowedsemrels relation with other result already linked to communities

NODE.name: countryPropagation
NODE.DESCRIPTION: associated to results colleced from allowedtypes and those in the whithelist the country of the organization(s) handling the datasource it is collected from

NODE.name: graphCleaning
NODE.DESCRIPTION: clean the properties in the graph typed as Qualifier according to the vocabulary indicated in schemeid

NODE.name: blacklistRelations
NODE.DESCRIPTION: removes blacklisted relations
